tweets.content: @opendatacon: #Networking time at #OGP Natural Resources Peer Exchange @opengovpart | 2nd day meeting at @redpuntoes #IODC16pic.twitter.com/TTZo1JB4Kw

info: This year’s peer exchange at IODC focused on the implementation of OGP commitments related to the release of information, open data and the visualization of information relevant to topics identified by the working group members as being of most concern: royalties and payments from natural resource revenues, beneficial ownership and environmental disclosures. It aimed to be a demand-driven, hands-on workshop for a targeted group of working group countries and civil society members to address challenges in commitment implementation and learn how these had been overcome in similar contexts. The workshop also brought in experts in the workshop themes to facilitate discussion and provide technical guidance.

session.description: IODC peer exchange was focused on the implementation of OGP commitments related with the release of information.

conference_notes: The follow-up actions include continuing the discussion on governance, clarifying the scope of the project, improving the information provided about the project, and collaborating more with local communities to identify blockers to the creation of identifiers.
name: OGP Natural Resources Peer Exchange
